import "./App.css"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; var x = document.getElementById("sideNav"); var y = document.getElementById("bun"); var z = document.getElementById("navUL"); function reportWindowSize() { var viewportWidth = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth; if (viewportWidth > 850) { x.style.display = "flex"; z.style.display = "flex"; } else { x.style.display = "none"; z.style.display = "none"; } console.log("change"); } window.onresize = reportWindowSize; // handle collapsing navbar function collapse() { if (x.style.display === "none") { x.style.display = "flex"; z.style.display = "flex"; } else { x.style.display = "none"; z.style.display = "none"; } console.log(x.style.display); console.log(z.style.display); } function Navbar() { return (
